data.title: Club TWiT Exclusives
data.meta_description: For only $7 per month, you can be a part of Club TWiT. As a member, you get all TWiT shows ad-free, private video podcast feeds for our exclusive members-only shows, our TWiT+
data.text:
“

iOS today carries useful information each week. It avoids long banter on Apple’s social policies that has become the hallmark of MacBreak Weekly. I learn something each show!

“

Both Mikah and Rosemary have done a great job replacing Leo. I really love their chemistry, presentation skills and knowledge. Thank you Leo for allowing and giving these protégés a chance to grow and showcase knowledge/skills.

“

Mikah and Rosemary bring you great information every week on how to get more out of your device. They expose great applications that I can use in unique ways leading to me being almost 100% iOS based.

“

I’m a huge fan of the TWIT network and love the addition of Mikah to the team. iOS Today is a great look at the latest iOS news and the most interesting apps. I don’t even use most of the apps that they talk about, but I really enjoy hearing what’s possible on iOS. Mikah is an excellent host and always guides an informative and fun show. Enjoying the permanent addition of Rosemary too!

“

iOS today is THE BEST iOS podcast

With the addition of Rosemary Orchard, the show feels like a whole new show. Both Mikah and Rosemary bring LOTS of knowledge to show about the iOS platform - and make it fun and casual. Definitely a must listen/watch!!

“

This is without a doubt the best home theater podcast out there, Scott is very passionate about the topic and is very knowledgable, I seem to learn something new and useful in every episode, and he also has very interesting guests that bring in even more information on various video/audio/home theater topics.

“

Scott and HT Geeks have consistently provided top-notch guests and interviews. Most tech podcasts have me checking the clock to see when they'll be done prattling. HT Geeks is always over too soon.

“

I enjoy Paul’s weekly releases with helpful how to’s and/or tips and tricks for making Windows the best it can be for you. I tune in to the segments each week to improve my skills with the OS I use daily.

“

A must-listen for Linux enthusiasts wanting to keep up with the latest Linux news, and to discover nifty command line tips you never knew existed, from knowledgable hosts with great camaraderie

“

I love the Untitled Linux Show because the hosts all have deep knowledge in different areas that makes for a rich discussion on all the topics. And it's always great to find out some option you didn't know about grep or ssh. Come for the news, stay for the command-line tips.
